job.title: je
job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-09T16:40:06.000Z", "description": "About RIOS

RIOS is a technology company helping global customers automate their factories, warehouses, and supply chain operations by deploying a new class of AI-powered and dexterous robots. RIOS robots handle hard-to-automate tasks, typically requiring human-level dexterity, in unstructured environments. RIOS is headquartered in Palo Alto, CA and has a pilot facility in San Carlos, CA. More information is available at www.rios.ai.

The Role

RIOS is looking for a Machine Learning Engineer that can work with and collect RIOS datasets, run experiments, and develop and apply new and/or different models to various customer use cases.

Requirements
  • Work daily on developing advanced algorithms using modern ML methods
  • Test and deploy models on custom & cloud hardware
  • Work on ML systems for data collection, management and training
  • Validate and test algorithms that push hardware and technology limits to solve real-world problems
  • Work with a multidisciplinary team to solve previously unsolvable problems
  • Leveraging and utilizing abstraction & scoping in software development to enable scalable systems
Attributes Of Desired Candidates Include
  • B.S. or M.S. with industrial experience (or equivalent) in Robotics, Computer Science, Machine Learning, or related field
  • Experience training custom/in-house datasets with State-of-the-Art models
  • Familiarity with algorithms and real world performance on GPUs
  • High degree of familiarity with ML/DL frameworks: TensorFlow, PyTorch, Theano, Keras, MXNet, Scikit Learn, etc.
  • Familiarity with databases such as SQL, NoSQL, and cloud solutions
  • Expert proficiency working with Python (C++ a plus)
  • Understanding of data typing and interaction with learning frameworks
  • Experience developing in containerized environments (e.g., Docker)
  • Attention to details such as documentation, version control and reproducibility
  • Familiarity with ROS (Robot Operating System)
Perks
  • Competitive salary package & Stock options for every employee
  • Healthcare + dental + vision insurance plans
  • 401(k) plan
  • Free lunch
  • Flexible time off & paid holidays
  • Social events + happy hours + team parties
